short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to detect and save materials for your projects as you browse the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Cornerstone web extension lets you save materials to a materials wishlist as you browse on popular websites like HomeDepot or Lowe's. We automatically detect product webpages and let you add items to your material list in one click. Finally, export your material list directly to a project estimate on Cornerstone, or save them to your personal Cornerstone materials hub!
